data.text: @trevorabryan @beswick_helene @pamallyn @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading @stenhousepub Thanks. I'll put it on my radar. Look at the power of technology. One tweet and retweet...😊

@beswick_helene @pamallyn @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading Should be out in December through @stenhousepub. Can sign up to receive preordering info through my website, https://t.co/w0iq40GJzc or just watch this space. Will be tweeting it out for sure! There is also an The Art of Comprehension Facebook page if that works better for you
@trevorabryan @pamallyn @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading Is your book for sale yet and through which publisher?
@pamallyn @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading Thanks so much, Pam! I really appreciate that. Means a lot to me. Glad we connected this morning-seems like we have a similar mission.
@trevorabryan @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading I absolutely love this! let me know how I can help you get the word out!

@pamallyn @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading @peterhreynolds helped me out w/ the illustrations. The goal of AoC is to help every student explore, find and share their unique voice so they can better comprehend their own lives & communicate their experiences thru the arts-The Access Lenses are designed to help them do this.

@pamallyn @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading Sure!! I would love that! The visual is from my upcoming book, The Art of Comprehension but is designed to be helpful without having to read the book. So yes, please, share away!! https://t.co/hyzmabPil2
@trevorabryan @malene_golding @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading I absolutely LOVE this!! Can we share this?

@malene_golding @pamallyn @ernestmorrell @HISDElemReading You might also be interested in this visual, which I use to help students strengthen comprehension skills through visual and written texts. Helps Ss to think about and discuss texts meaningfully and deeply. Reach out if you ever have questions. https://t.co/poP7b5Ndw6
